about_the_game:
Flibbles is a third person casual adventure, placing you in the marvelous world of Flibbble Land. You are farmer going about your daily routine, when suddenly you are faced up against a mysterious foe only known as Purple Goo. Its up to you to fend off the Purple Goo and save Flibble Land and its cute and adorable creatures.

Flibbles!
Variety of Flibbles to collect, each with a unique appearance and abilities. Tame Flibbles along your journey and command them to your will.

Avatar Customization!
Customize your avatar with your surroundings.

Crafting!
Combine objects around you and create the necessary items at hand.

Fishing!
Fish for a chance to tame new and unique Flibbles to add to your collection.
